title: CallingPartyEnum
description: Identifies a party to the on-demand repo transaction that has a right to demand for termination of the Security Finance transaction.

oneOf.title: Either
oneOf.description: Either, Buyer or Seller to the repo transaction.

oneOf.title: InitialBuyer
oneOf.description: Initial buyer to the repo transaction.

oneOf.title: InitialSeller
oneOf.description: Initial seller to the repo transaction.
